amendment.description: To require the enterprise architecture and implementation plan for the Information Sharing Network to include equipment and training requirements and utilization costs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3799 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3799 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Coleman. (consideration: CR S10248-10250; text: CR S10249) To require the enterprise architecture and implementation plan for the Information Sharing Network to include equipment and training requirements and utilization costs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3799 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3799 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Coleman.
